comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: The riverboat "Missionary" is towed upstream with supplies for Grant's men at Chattanooga, TN.

comment.author: 24889004@N05
comment._content:
Stereo card published by Olden, Sawyer & Co. Registered in 1866.  Title is "Rapids on Tennessee River,   Steamer working over by means of Cables."
Michael McEachern
